title: Volunteering - AFEV
description: Weekly support for young people facing academic and social difficulties through individualized mentoring and collective educational activities. This volunteering develops interpersonal, listening, and pedagogical skills while contributing to combating educational inequality.

title: Civic Service - UNIS-CITÉ
description: Participation in a civic service program aimed at reducing the digital divide for seniors. Conducted collective workshops and personalized support to help users become autonomous in digital usage. Developed skills in animation, pedagogy, and social project management.
skills: Digital Inclusion, Animation, Service Mindset, Autonomy

title: Volunteering - Educational Games for Kindergarten
description: Volunteer participation in a research project in kindergarten school, aiming to assess children's math skills through educational games. Designed and tested interactive mini-games promoting number recognition and mathematical logic. Collaborated with teachers and researchers.

title: IoT Internship - IUT Saint-Jérôme
description: Designed a complete IoT system for sensor data collection (brightness, electrical intensity, presence detection). Developed two Flask servers for real-time data visualization and transmission, integration with Grafana and MariaDB, backup automation and alerting, and project documentation on GitHub. Experience combining electronics, programming, and system administration.
skills: IoT, Python (Flask), Raspberry Pi, MariaDB, Grafana, ESP32, STM32, Autonomy, Automation, Documentation
